formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information such as the container and the credentials for the Cargo tool. (Required)

formElement.label: Application Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the application pom.xml file where is locataed the configuration of the container to stop the container. (Required)

formElement.label: Time limit:
formElement.documentation: >Time to wait for test the connectivity of the container (if blank, the execution waits 10 seconds by default after stopping the container).
